author: Justin Paulhamus
text: 'Why do you put peppers
column5: onions
column6: and mushrooms in your chicken pad Thai. It was absolutely disgusting.'

author: Fred Abramo
text: "The worst $40 I ever spent burnt egg roll that you couldn't even eat it the portions are so small the sush was the worst I've ever had horrible experience I will never eat there again I recommend you not to eat there"

author: bizzy izzy
text: 'Sushi is good. Very fresh fish. One thing. I got my daughter who is 9 Sesame chicken. While the dish itself was very tasty
column5: i was shocked to see red peppers
column7: mixed in with it. I have gotten Sesame chicken for her for years. NEVER has it come with spicy anything'

author: Alvaro Aldaz Cuevas
text: 'very good
column5: lots of variety. Great sushi!'

author: Cherish theday
text: 'My favorite sushi spot ever
column5: I always order hand rolled eel avo
column6: philly roll plus the ikura. Highly recommend these dishes.'

author: Jon Zanan
text: 'Good price and quality'

author: Ben Thomson
text: 'Great food! Solid takeout option'

author: Fred Snyder
text: 'Great food- what more do you need?'

author: Mattington Bear
text: 'Food is bad.  Maybe they are coughing on it in the back?\nBe careful because you will be charged more than the menu says.'

author: Mark Glass
text: 'Been ordering from here for 20 years. The food has not always been the best but for the price you cant beat it
column5: until this time. I ordered roast pork egg fu young like I have for many years. It usually comes with plenty of fresh vegetables and big chunks of pork. This time it was obvious that they used frozen peas and carrots. What was not obvious
column6: was the pork. It seemed to be absent. Tasted terrible. Huge drop in quality. Shame because they were my go to for so many years.'

author: Punit Shah
text: "Mediocre experience unfortunately. Spicy udon noodles had only spice no flavor
column5: veggie sushi was ok but didn't impress on quality."

author: Parker Wolf
text: 'Never going back. Been going here awhile now for about 3 months
column5: at least once a week. Never had an issue until I ordered today
column6: Labor Day. Ordered general tso’s chef special with an egg roll. 1 hour passed and I called in to see what was up (usually only takes 45 minutes or less). The employee acknowledged and apologized that it was late. She said it would be there in about 3 minutes (how long it takes to get to my place via bike). 20 minutes later my food arrives. I open the bag and go to take out my food
column7: when I realize that my containers are soaked in general tso’s sauce. I discover further that the entire bag had been fipped over. There was so much sauce at the bottom of the bag that it literally bled through. That’s too much sauce. Food was cold
column8: egg roll was overcooked. .5 stars if I could!'

author: Ali Naizi
text: 'Got the worst food poisoning. Been throwing up since\n4 am. Won’t be coming here ever again.'

author: Jaziel Spears
text: 'Would certainly recommend visiting this place. Fantastic character
column5: flavorful dishes

author: Taylor Chausky
text: 'Best bang for your buck!'

author: Diego Argentina
text: "Unbelievable quality and flavours!! the soups and food  are great. It's Very cheap. The ratio quality/price is awesome."

author: Megan Gillen
text: 'A hidden gem for sushi in Hoboken- really great price for the large amount of food you get! I will definitely be back to try the other food on the menu
column5: but definitely enjoyed the sushi.'

author: Rocky Manghani
text: "Get the chicken and honey roasted walnuts..best I've ever had"

author: Matt Meyer
text: 'Overcooked soggy wontons
column5: really bland rice
column6: very good sesame chicken sauce but very cheap quality meat. Chicken and broccoli tasted fishy and chewy. Spare ribs very fatty. Not great place ..'

author: Ashley Bromiley
text: 'Great option for fast inexpensive sushi'

author: Stephanie Gil
text: 'This is the BEST chinese in Hoboken and super super consistent in the quality. Love ! Also
column5: the woman who runs the place is very nice.'

author: Daniel Kadyrov
text: 'Cheap is cheap. I got a lunch special for under $6. Wonton soup had 2 mediocre dumplings in it. Boneless spare ribs were good.'

author: Ireland Tawney
text: 'There crab rangoon is not good'

author: Gregg Saldutti
text: 'Excellent'

author: Tim Leonard
text: 'Great place to grab a quick bite'

author: Molly Lyman
text: "I like this place
column5: but maybe in the Sunset or Richmond is a better option because Haight St. people don't know Asian white chicken. They don't know what that is really. I mean

author: Sarah Braslavets
text: 'Really great food
column5: relatively cheap for its quality. Cute atmosphere
column6: cozy. Some food is a hit or miss. Definitely worth a try.'

author: Kevin Largacha
text: 'Quick food. Deliveries on time. Quality Chinese Fast Food. Great place and go to for a College Student'

author: takmien Miah
text: 'horrible the rice is not even cooked and dumplings  are soggy no wonder why they"re cheap'

author: Michelle Li
text: 'Good price and delicious food. California and spicy tuna roll were yummy. This is my favorite  restaurant on Washington street! Would definitely go back if I can.'

author: Swapnil Prabhu
text: 'Nice sushi places! Miso soup was best! Tried spicy salmon and California roll sushi. All good!!'

author: Charles Martocello
text: 'Excellent pupu platter. General tsos chicken is amazing and general tsos tofu is great. Long delivery time however.'

author: Matt Ruppert
text: 'It was good
column5: solid basic Chinese food. Portions were normal sized
column6: not huge but also not walking away hungry. I recommend general tsos chicken. Friend got sushi and it was good'

author: Nan Yin
text: 'hunan noodles are my favourite'

author: ForestArcher 818
text: 'The chicken teriyaki was amazing the soy sauce was esquieset in taste.The bochoy
column5: broccoli and carrots where cooked to perfection.I will come hungry for more and recomend it to others if you want your taste buds exploding with flavor.'

author: Guille Montanari
text: 'This place is my favorite in Hoboken!!! Every option is delicious and the prices are all cheap.'

author: Madhura Nijsure
text: 'Very cheap
column5: lots of food
column6: healthy options! Got a 5.85 chicken chopsuey which was served with white rice - was enough for two meals!'

author: Michelle Liu
text: 'This is my favorite restaurant of all times! The food here is wonderful! Sushi is fresh and the service is great! I would definitely come back here! :D'

author: LiuZer Metoo
text: 'Love eating here. Great food. Really comfortable. Would come here everyday if I could.'

author: Camilo Abboud
text: 'Great price and food quality/flavor. The best option in Washington st.'

author: David Spencer
text: 'Had the Sushi
column5: and Singapore Lo Mein
column6: washed down with a cold Sapporo

author: Jonathan Gajda
text: 'DO NOT EAT HERE. HORRIBLE FOOD POISONING FROM THE SUSHI. BEEN BED RIDDEN FOR TWO DAYS.'

author: Stephen Opet
text: 'Small
column5: family owned shop sells a stupendous amount of delicious food for a very modest price.'

author: Maria Tarar
text: "Don't order delivery from these guys. An hour and a half and we're still waiting. We call for a status and she's like I call my guys he needs two more minutes. You called him before I called you because you foreshadowed my phone call? hmmm okay.. gotchya."

author: cole
text: 'Terrible delivery time
column5: over 90 minutes'

author: Ethan Dy Tioco
text: 'The chicken teriyaki looked good but the taste was 3.5.'

author: Manny Baez
text: 'is good'

author: Veronica
text: "Over 2 hours on delivery on a Sunday.\n\nSit-in dining isn't bad
column5: but don't order delivery."

author: David Roman
text: "Worse customer service ever and they only have sodas. No non-carbonated drinks whatsoever. Walked out of there after waiting for the waitress for about 10 minutes to take my order; and there was nobody there. It's not like it was busy."

author: Dave G
text: "I feel as that the sushi is the best around
column5: in terms of not fancy sushi places. They are relatively quick in delivery as well as actual service in store. The actual place is not the best
column6: but it's the food that you're there for

author: Matthew Welt
text: "We keep ordering from here because we like the food
column5: but it routinely takes two hours for the food to get here
column6: and by then it's cold. Absolutely ridiculous."
